Author: tseokii
Text: Yes, they're called petichiae, and they're popped blood vessels under your skin. I get them too. It's a big part of why I stopped purging (although there's like a hundred better reasons lol) It comes from straining. No matter how much I tried to avoid straining, I couldn't avoid getting them tho... unfortunately there's nothing that can be done but they will heal and disappear with a little time.
